source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_000<tab>Up to something? Me? Never! I am but a fun-loving imp, here to help my fellow revelers enjoy the Wake! And I can fashion you a <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> convincing guise for the masquerade. Ehehehe...
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_000<tab>Hi hi hi... Tu as bien fait de venir me voir. On ne dirait pas à première vue, mais je ne suis pas un imp comme les autres. En fait, je possède un pouvoir spécial<var 1D /var>: celui de déguiser les <var 08 E905 ((aven<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rières)) ((aventuriers)) /var> comme toi en un personnage célèbre de leur choix<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_001<tab>All I need is for you to recall a journey, a journey unforgettable. Traverse your memories, and tell me what you see...
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_001<tab>Alors dis-moi, qu'est-ce qui t'a le plus marqué au cours de tes aventures<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_Q1_000_000<tab>À quoi pensez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A1_000_001<tab>A journey to liberate lands near and far.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A1_000_001<tab>La libération de Doma et d'Ala Mhigo

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A1_000_002<tab>A journey to reclaim the night sky.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A1_000_002<tab>Les porteurs d'ombre

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A1_000_003<tab>A journey to silence the song of oblivion.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A1_000_003<tab>Les chroniques de l'apocalypse

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_002<tab>Good, good. Now think of someone remarkable you encountered in that time, someone <var 1A 02 /var>powerful<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, that's it...
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_002<tab>Oh, je vois, très intéressant... Maintenant, dis-moi quelle personne t'a laissé la plus forte impression<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_Q2_000_000<tab>À qui pensez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_000<tab>A dauntless Hyuran man of integrity from the Far East.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_000<tab>Un seigneur hyur oriental au caractère franc et généreux

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_001<tab>A devoted Auri woman who has mastered the art of the shinobi.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_001<tab>Une shinobi aoranne fidèle et dévouée

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_002<tab>A haughty but valorous Auri man with a yearning heart.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_002<tab>Un Ao Ra solitaire et arrogant qui vit pour se battre

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_003<tab>An Auri woman strong of body and stronger of will.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_003<tab>Une Ao Ra fière et déterminée au grand cœur

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_004<tab>A sweet Auri woman who lives according to her faith.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_004<tab>Une charmante Ao Ra délicate et pieuse

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_005<tab>A crimson-garbed Hyuran woman fleet of foot and fist.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_005<tab>Une Hyure très sportive vêtue d'une magnifique robe écarlate

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_006<tab>A Hyuran man whose strength and compassion made him a legend.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_006<tab>Un Hyur héroïque, toujours entouré de quatre animaux sacrés

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_007<tab>A vindictive Hyuran man of savage political cunning.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_007<tab>Un Hyur très sentimental, qui joue le rôle d'un ambassadeur plénipotentiaire

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_008<tab>A Garlean man who hunts the servants of Darkness.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_008<tab>Un puissant Garlemaldais ayant vaincu de nombreux Asciens

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_009<tab>An erudite Auri woman who holds the title of Archon.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_009<tab>Une Ao Ra très érudite ayant un statut de Preux

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_010<tab>A Hyuran man inspired to take up the arms of his Ala Mhigan allies.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_010<tab>Un Hyur fier de ses aptitudes en combat, qui porte le rouge à merveille

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_011<tab>A Hyuran man inspired to take up the arms of his Far Eastern allies.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_011<tab>Un Hyur équipé d'un katana, qui porte le rouge à merveille

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_020<tab>A sagacious Miqo'te woman skilled in the magical arts.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_020<tab>Une Miqo'te très instruite, se déclarant sorcière

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_021<tab>An Elezen man who reads the stars as easily as his tomes.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_021<tab>Un Élézen laconique capable de lire dans les étoiles

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_022<tab>A handsome Hyuran man who fights to protect those he loves.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_022<tab>Un pistosabreur hyur qui ne manque pas de courage

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_023<tab>A dainty Hyuran woman who chose to carve her own fate.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_023<tab>Une Hyure aux prunelles azurées et au destin dramatique

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_024<tab>A Hyuran man who keeps his pirate crew in line as their acting captain.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_024<tab>Un Hyur à la tête de pirates en tant que capitaine remplaçant

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_025<tab>A Hyuran man famed for his skills as a beastmaster.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_025<tab>Un Hyur connu comme dresseur d'exception

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_026<tab>An obstinate Lalafellin woman from a distinguished family of beastmasters.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_026<tab>Une Lalafelle orgueilleuse venant d'une famille de dresseurs renommée

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_027<tab>A cruel Garlean man who serves as a legatus of the Empire.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_027<tab>Un Garlemaldais dévoué, général de l'Empire

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_028<tab>A Hyuran man who brought the night sky to a world flooded by Light.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_028<tab>Un Hyur qui porte le noir à merveille

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_030<tab>An Elezen man who serves as a respected member of the Forum.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_030<tab>Un Élézen membre du Conseil de Sharlayan

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_031<tab>A compassionate Elezen woman determined to give children a brighter future.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_031<tab>Une Élézenne d'une grande bonté, dirigeant le Comité

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_032<tab>A Garlean man determined to restore the broken remains of his homeland.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_032<tab>Un Garlemaldais qui cherche à reconstruire sa patrie

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_033<tab>A Viera man who travels the world in search of esoteric curios.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_033<tab>Un Viéra parcourant le monde à la recherche d'objets précis

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_034<tab>A Hyuran man who crossed time and space to protect this star.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_034<tab>Un Hyur à qui l'aube va à merveille

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_035<tab>A Hyuran man who spends his life collecting treasures of the Far East.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_035<tab>Un Hyur amateur d'antiquités orientales

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_036<tab>A Miqo'te woman who shares her body with the soul of an ancient magus.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_036<tab>Une Miqo'te portant en elle l'âme d'un ancien mage

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_040<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_040<tab>Annuler

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_004<tab>Ehehehe... That will do nicely. Don't worry, this won't hurt much at all! Just close your eyes...
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_004<tab>Hi hi hi hi<var 1D /var>! Je vois très bien à qui tu penses<var 1D /var>! Eh hop, voilà ton déguisement<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>The transfiguration can be removed by using the “Unveil” action, or by canceling the “Transfiguration” status effect.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Pour reprendre votre apparence normale, utilisez l'action “Retrait de déguisement” dans la barre de raccourcis spéciale.

source: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_010<tab>Pay no mind to this little imp! I'm <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> busy during the Wake─I've no time for mundane mummers, no.
target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_010<tab>Hum, tu dis avoir été convié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> par l'impresario<var 1D /var>? Je serais au courant si c'était le cas... Je suis désolé, mais je ne peux utiliser mon sort de transformation que sur les invités...
